chain.description: Question: Could you please specify which island in the USA you are referring to for your vacation, so that I can provide accurate weather forecasts and images of the beaches?

Great! Now I will begin by fetching daily weather forecasts for the next 7 days on the Hawaii Island, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and precipitation probability. Let's start with a web search to find a reliable source for this information.

chain.description: I found a source for the Hawaii Island weather forecast at [Big Island Weather Forecast](https://bigislandnow.com/weather/). Now, next task is to retrieve images of the Hawaii Island beaches to provide visual confirmation of the location as well. Let's perform an image search.

chain.description:
I have successfully retrieved images of Hawaii Island beaches that can enhance your excitement for the trip. Here are vivid representations:
1. ![Hapuna Beach State Park - Lindbergh Hero Unit Photo](https://www.gohawaii.com/sites/default/files/styles/image_gallery_bg_xl/public/hero-unit-images/Hapuna%20Beach%20State%20Park.jpg.webp?itok=L_3StqmX). Visit [Go Hawaii](https://www.gohawaii.com/islands/hawaii-big-island/things-to-do/beaches) for more details about the beautiful beaches of Hawaii Island.
2. ![A Perfect Beach - Paradise In Hawaii Blog Image](https://www.paradiseinhawaii.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/MainHeader1000h.jpg). For descriptions, visit Paradise in Hawaii at [Big Island Beaches](https://www.paradiseinhawaii.com/big-island-beaches/).

Moreover, you can see the detailed [weather forecast on Big Island Now](https://bigislandnow.com/weather/), which will help you prepare for your daily activities and accommodate clothing for daily temperature changes, wind climate, precipitation chances, etc.

Going to finish the task with these valuable information results.

{"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"For daily weather forecasts and understanding current weather conditions at this vacation spot, please check [Big Island Weather Forecast](https://bigislandnow.com/weather/). Additionally, below are some amazing beach images from Hawaii Island to get you excited about your visit:\n1. ![Hapuna Beach State Park](https://www.gohawaii.com/sites/default/files/styles/image_gallery_bg_xl/public/hero-unit-images/Hapuna%20Beach%20State%20Park.jpg.webp?itok=L_3StqmX) from [Go Hawaii](https://www.gohawaii.com/islands/hawaii-big-island/things-to-do/beaches).\n2. ![Perfect Beach](https://www.paradiseinhawaii.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/MainHeader1000h.jpg) from [Paradise in Hawaii](https://www.paradiseinhawaii.com/big-island-beaches/)."}

function.name: search_image_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform image search using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with parameters like **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of images), **start** (starting index of results), and others. The request will genera"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

function.name: search_web_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform text search on the web using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with various parameters such as **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of results), **start** (starting index of results),  and more. Th"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.google_search_json: Provides Google search results in JSON format. Its features include web search, image search, autocomplete, and trending search.
